# Welcome {-}

```{r global_options, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE)  
```

<img src="images/cover/advrs_cover.png" width="250" height="366" align="right" alt="Cover image" />

This book offers solutions to the exercises from Hadley Wickham's book [Advanced R](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/) (Edition 2).

The solutions to the first edition of Advanced R can be found at https://advanced-r-solutions-ed1.netlify.com.

The code for this book is on [GitHub](https://github.com/Tazinho/Advanced-R-Solutions.git). Your PRs and suggestions are very welcome.
